author: thorsten
msg: Adding --followLinks argument to the cocoon cli call. This way one can set project.followLinks to true or false. see http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/userdocs/offline/cli.html. Test it with "forrest -Dproject.followLinks=false". This will only generate the linkmap.html. One step closer to generate only pages that have been modified
